title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: Google will accept cryptocurrency payments for cloud services through Coinbase.According to CBNC, Google will begin taking crypto payments from select clients for its cloud services in early 2023, a rumour that sent Coinbase shares up 5% on Tuesday.In reaction to this agreement, Coinbase Commerce will migrate "data-related apps" from Amazon Web Services cloud to Google cloud.According to the report, the terms of the agreement have not been disclosed, but Jim Migdal, Vice President of business development at Coinbase, stated that the agreement will be similar to other Coinbase Commerce arrangements in that Armstrong Coinbase will earn a cut for every transaction that goes through the system.Coinbase Commerce now accepts 10 cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether's USDT, and Dogecoin.CBNC also stated that it is unclear whether Google would continue to use Coinbase for payment processing due to competition from a recently crypto-integrated PayPal business solution.Source: https://mycryptoparadise.com/google-to-use-coinbase-to-accept-crypto-payments-for-cloud-services/

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: They had to sooner or later, every institution will have to bend the knee for bitcoin in the medium to long term. I wouldn’t get too excited about this though because it isn’t for all services. It’s only for a select group of people.Obviously this is good news, it won’t do too much for the price though just yet.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: That's a good decision because they can't stop the adoption of accepting payments in crypto. It's timely although implementation has to wait, that's fine.Next time, the other big tech companies will also start accepting it.

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: This is the right decision. And it seems to me that the recognition of the place of cryptocurrency in the global economy. Even a giant like Google no longer believes that it will burst like a soap bubble. And that's good.
